channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Microsoft blogs

item.title: “What’s New” in Microsoft Entra is Generally Available
item.description: With over 800,000 organizations relying on Microsoft Entra to navigate the ever-changing identity and network access threat landscape, it's crucial to have increased transparency about product updates, especially those requiring your action. Today, I'm excited to announce the general availability of "What's new in Microsoft Entra". This experience in the Microsoft Entra admin center provides a centralized view of our roadmap and change announcements across the Microsoft Entra identity and network access portfolio. In this article, I'll guide admins on how to make the most of this new feature t...
